content.rendered: Synne Syrrist is an independent business consultant and has extensive experience as a non-executive director of both private and public companies. Ms Syrrist was previously a partner and financial analyst at First Securities. She currently serves on the board of several public companies, including Awilco LNG ASA, Awilco Drilling Ltd and Eidesvik Offshore ASA. She holds an MSc from the Norwegian University of Science and Technology and qualified as an authorised financial analyst at the Norwegian School of Economics and Business Administration. Ms Syrrist is a Norwegian citizen and resides in Oslo, Norway.

excerpt.rendered: Ms Syrrist is an independent business consultant, and has extensive experience as a non-executive director of both private and public companies.

jetpack-related-posts.title: Yvonne Litsheim Sandvold  |  Board Member
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Ms Sandvold is the Chief Operating Officer of Frognerbygg AS, and has extensive experience from the Norwegian real estate industry.

jetpack-related-posts.title: Haakon Brandrud  |  Director of Strategy and Corporate Development
Glen Ole Rødland  |  Chairman of the Board
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Glen is a senior partner at HitecVision. For 10 years prior he was a partner and co-investor of Direct Active Investments in Ferncliff TIH AS.

jetpack-related-posts.title: Reuben Segal  |  Board Member
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Over 20 years' experience in the offshore and shipping sectors covering both engineering design and ship surveying.
